"Kuronite Investigation":
"Kuronites in the Kuron region of planet
Harkotan are showing signs of disturbing
movement. It appears they are going to
attack the Shironia region. This is not
something that we can ignore.
All ARKS are to sortie, confirm the
situation, and subdue when necessary.
――――――――――――――――――――
Collect [200] Quest Points
by defeating Kuronites."
